name: Roskis: A Boozy Beginning - Demo
description:
This is a demo of Roskis: A Boozy Beginning

Explore the planet Roskis, meet hippie robots and corporate dinosaurs, find your runaway animals, battle against a pineapple pizza, and save the planet from... OH NO!

The full game will be released FOR FREE on Steam on December 3rd.

Make sure to wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1729710/Roskis_A_Boozy_Beginning/
